title:
Drawing
Drawing, "Colonel William Dwight, Jr. Inspecting His Regiment", 1862
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, across bottom: Colonel Dwight inspecting his / regt. / Sickle's Brigade 70th New York Volunteers (Col. later Brig. - Gen. William Dwight, Jr.).
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of officers and faintly indicated lines of soldiers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing
Drawing, "Colonel William Dwight, Jr. Inspecting His Regiment", 1862.
1862. Graphite on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-141.
